title: Gachatris Legends
alpha_note: This Game is under Alpha stage, version 0.2.1 Rev. 21 OTA. If you have any suggestions, go contact the developer through the official Gachatris Discord Server.
splash_note: Press any key, tap, or click anywhere to start.
loading_note: Note: the loading bar does not show 100% of the files to load during the initialization of this application.
fsw_patch_notes_coming_soon: Full Patch Notes to reveal soon!
fsw_patch_notes_coming_soon_desc: You'll see almost every single version detail of the Game after some updates. Coming soon!
fsw_keybinds_ingame_blob_desc: Adjust key bindings for Gachae Linkblobs
fsw_keybinds_ingame_general_desc: Map keys for when you're playing a session.
fsw_nameplate_note: Note: the maximum number of characters for your nameplate is 20.
fsw_nameplate_samename_title: You are not actually changing your name!
fsw_nameplate_samename_desc: Your desired name "var=0" appears to be the same as your saved nameplate. Try using a different name.
fsw_nameplate_noname_desc: You need to specify your name with at least one alphanumeric or special character!
fsw_kb_adding_text_you: You are adding a key to this flag: [nl]var=0[nl][nl]- Press any key and hold for one second to bind it to this flag;[nl]- press a key or click anywhere to cancel.
fsw_kb_changing_text_you: You are changing one of the keys to this flag: [nl]var=0[nl]Active: [var=1][nl][nl]- Press and hold [var=1] for one second to remove it;[nl]- press and hold any other key for one second to bind it to this flag;[nl]- press only or click anywhere to cancel.
fsw_kb_adding_binding_you: Keep holding key [var=0] to add. Release immediately to cancel.
fsw_kb_changing_binding_you: Keep holding key [var=0] to set. Release immediately to cancel.
fsw_kb_changing_nothing_you: Keep holding key [var=0] or release immediately to cancel.
fsw_kb_changing_removing_you: Keep holding key [var=0] to remove. Release immediately to cancel.
fsw_kb_setting_saving_you: Key [var=0] has been successfully bound to this flag. Please wait while the game tries to save your settings to your local database.
fsw_kb_already_existing_you: Key [var=0] already exists in this flag. Cancelling...
fsw_kb_removing_saving_you: Key [var=0] has been successfully removed from this flag. Please wait while the game tries to save your settings to your local database.
fsw_kb_ig_gtris_left_desc: Moves the active Gachaquadromino, unit by unit, to the left of the board.
fsw_kb_ig_gtris_right_desc: Moves the active Gachaquadromino, unit by unit, to the right of the board.
fsw_kb_ig_gtris_softdrop_desc: Increases the falling speed of a Gachaqudromino until a button is released.
fsw_kb_ig_gtris_harddrop_desc: Instantly drops the active Gachaquadromino to the surface of the Stack and locks it down completely.
fsw_kb_ig_gtris_cw_desc: Rotates the active Gachaquadromino to the same direction as the way the hands of an analog clock are rotating (rightwards).
fsw_kb_ig_gtris_ccw_desc: Rotates the active Gachaquadromino to the direction opposite to how the hands of an analog clock are rotating (leftwards).
fsw_kb_ig_gtris_c180w_desc: Flips the active Gachaquadromino with respect to the rotation of its axis. This is great for crazy spins in the Professional Mode.
fsw_kb_ig_gtris_hold_desc: Holds the active Gachaquadromino into the Hold queue. If there is already a held Gachaquadromino, it'll be inserted to the board as an active Gachaquadromino.
fsw_kb_ig_gtris_s1_desc: Activate the first skill in your deck
fsw_kb_ig_gtris_s2_desc: Activate the second skill in your deck
fsw_kb_ig_gtris_s3_desc: Activate the third skill in your deck
fsw_kb_ig_blob_left_desc: Moves the active Linkblob Segment, unit by unit, to the left of the board.
fsw_kb_ig_blob_right_desc: Moves the active Linkblob Segment, unit by unit, to the right of the board.
fsw_kb_ig_blob_softdrop_desc: Increases the falling speed of a Linkblob Segment until a button is released. When it lands on the surface whilst holding a button, it'll momentarily be locked down.
fsw_kb_ig_blob_harddrop_desc: Instantly drops the active Linkblob Segment to the surface of the Stack and locks it down completely.
fsw_kb_ig_blob_cw_desc: Rotates the active Linkblob Segment to the same direction as the way the hands of an analog clock are rotating (rightwards). If the Segment is unable to rotate and a button is pressed twice in a rapid succession, it'll rotate by 180°.
fsw_kb_ig_blob_ccw_desc: Rotates the active Linkblob Segment to the direction opposite to how the hands of an analog clock are rotating (leftwards). If the Segment is unable to rotate and a button is pressed twice in a rapid succession, it'll rotate by 180°.
fsw_kb_ig_blob_s1_desc: Activate the first skill in your deck
fsw_kb_ig_blob_s2_desc: Activate the second skill in your deck
fsw_kb_ig_blob_s3_desc: Activate the third skill in your deck
error_kb_duplicate: Key [var=0] already exists in this flag
error_kb_duplicate_desc: Duplicate keys cannot exist in the same flag.
menu_main: Gachatris Legends: Neoplexus Blocks and Blobs v0.2.1 Rev. 21 WROTA
menu_replaycenter_desc: Head over to the Replay Center to watch your game replays from files.
menu_changelog_desc: See how far the Game has gone through.
menu_discord_desc: Enter this Discord server so you can communicate with Gachatris + Linkblobs users and report bugs there. Be civil!
gameend_replaycenter_desc: Head over to the Replay Center to watch your game replays from files.
gameend_watchreplay_desc: Watch the replay of the current session.
gameend_downloadreplay_desc: Download the replay of the current session as a ".gtlrx" file.
gameend_startover_desc: Create a new session with the parameters of the previous session.
gameend_mainmenu_desc: Head back to the Main Menu.
gameend_online_mainmenu_desc: Head back to Online Menu if you are still connected to the server. Otherwise, you will go back to the Main Menu.
gameend_replay_download_desc: Download the replay of the current session as a ".gtlrx" file. In case this replay has not been saved, select this.
replayload_minmax_desc: Use sliders to tell the game which subreplay to start with and which subreplay to end with.
replayloadmm_play_desc: View this replay session with select subreplays in a sequence ranging from the selected index of the first subreplay to the selected index of the last subreplay.
replayloadmm_range_start_slider_desc: Move this slider to tell the Game to start a replay session with which subreplay will be the first.
replayloadmm_range_end_slider_desc: Move this slider to tell the game to end a replay session after which subreplay will be the last ends.
settings_audiovolume_desc: Adjust audio volumes like sound effects, music, and interface sounds. You can also override in-game music.
settings_nameplate_desc: Edit your displayed nameplate. Your nameplate is shown under your playing field in a game session. Your in-game name is "$<playername>".
settings_keybind_desc: Bind the buttons of your keyboard/gamepad to specific triggers.
settings_miscellaneous_desc: Adjust miscellaneous settings like enabling the in-session stack warning system or enabling result animations.
audiovolume_sound_desc: Adjust the volume for sound effects.
audiovolume_musicbank_desc: Change music to play for a match session.
audiovolume_musicbank_insane_desc: Change music to play for a match session when a player is in an enhancement state.
audiovolume_musicbank_warning_desc: Change music to play for a match session when a player is some moments away from losing.
miscellaneous_background_dewc: Change how the in-session background looks.
keybind_general_desc: Adjust general keybinding. General keybinds are applied to both Gachatris and Linkblobs.
start_title: Start - Select Amount of Player Slots
start_1p_desc: Play modes alone and feel like this is your practice area. You can take a challenge on this mode.
start_mp_desc: Play modes that include your opposing player controlled by Computer. In case of 3-way or 4-way offline multiplayer sessions, you can assign what team you belong to.
start_omp_desc: Go online and play modes that include your online players across a server. In case of 3-way or 4-way offline multiplayer sessions, you can assign what team you belong to.
onlinemain_title: Gachatris Legends: NBnB Alpha - Online Test
onlinemain_vsquick_desc: Start a new Versus session against a random existing player.
onlinemain_inputcode_desc: Start a new room by entering a room code. The server will detect whether there's already a room with your code, and if it doesn't detect one, you'll be able to create and host yours with your desired code.
onlinemain_joinroom_desc: Join an existing room by entering a room code. The server will detect whether there's already a room with your code, and if it detects one, you'll be able to join it.
vsquick_matchmaking_stop_desc: Stop Matchmaking (warning: sometimes, when you press this button, then shortly after will the game start.)
1pstart_zen_desc: Play this relaxing game mode where you practice your gameplay.
1pstart_blob_modes_desc: Open game modes featuring Gachae Linkblobs
mpstart_settings_playeramount_desc: Choose the amount of players (including yourself) that you want to have in a session. If there are 3-4 players, the players will sit side-by-side with narrower bodies.
mpstart_settings_boardpos_mp_desc: Choose which board you want to play. In the case of a session with 2 players, you can pick one of two boards to play on, LEFT and RIGHT; in the case of a session with 3 to 4 players, you can pick which board to play on, from 1st to 4th.
mpstart_versus_desc: Play this plain mode against one Computer or so, with teaming in case of a 3-way or 4-way multiplayer. You have the freedom to choose either Gachatris or Linkblobs.
mpstart_swap_desc: Play this confusing yet fun game mode where you have Gachatris and Linkblobs take turns over a certain amount of time.
mpstart_wormhole_desc: Play this exciting mode where your board gets an upgrade that lasts a certain amount of time. After the time expires, the game will then evaluate your total garbage collected. You have the freedom to choose either Gachatris or Linkblobs.
mpstart_fever_desc: Play this Linkblob-only mode featuring its own upgrade mode, the Fever.
mpstart_rpg_desc: This is in Alpha stage where there are bugs present in this mode. Players have special skills using three of what's called "Character Cards". Each card adds up attributes and a specific skill. You have the freedom to choose either Gachatris or Linkblobs.
gameprep_settings_desc: Tweak and prepare settings for this session.
gameprepset_wins_desc: Adjust the number of round wins needed in a match.
gameprepset_margintime_desc: When the round time reaches the margin time in seconds, the game will start periodically increasing the attack.
gameprepset_marginenable_desc: If off, there will be no periodic increase in attack.
gameprepset_targetpoint_desc: Target point is divided from a chain score (per garbage.) This does not apply to Gachatris-only sessions.
gameprepset_poplimit_desc: In Linkblobs, if a group of Blobs or so reach a specified number of connected Blobs, they will vanish, making a chain.
gameprepset_wormhole_insanetime_desc: Adjust the initial Enhancement time for every Enhancement round.
gameprepset_wormhole_hp_desc: Adjust the Health Points of each player.
gameprepset_fever_maxtime_desc: Adjust the maximum collected time length for a Fever mode.
gameprepset_fever_inittime_desc: Adjust the starting duration or time length for a Fever mode.
gameprepset_fever_gaugeadd_desc: Adjust the number of Fever orbs to activate every time a player deflects garbage.
gameprepset_swap_time_desc: Adjust the countdown time every time swap happens.
gameprepset_swap_initialmode_desc: Select which mode to start with.
gameprepset_insane_start_desc: Adjust which mode of Enhancement state to start with.
gameprepset_gachatris_professional_desc: Professional Gachatris Mode changes some settings for Gachatris, making it a fast-paced mode. This only applies to Gachatris-only sessions.
gameprepset_gachatris_tsdonly_desc: In Gachatris-only sessions, this challenge limits you to only clearing 2 lines with a T-Spin (or a Mini T-Spin.) To win, you need to do 20 TSD's in a row. You can also do T-Spins without even clearing a line.
gameprepset_gachatris_spin_desc: Spins (and minis) reward bonuses (especially Back-to-backs.) They work by rotating a piece tucking into a tight slot.
gameprepset_gachatris_holdenable_desc: Enabling this option gives Gachatris the ability to hold pieces. Adjust how a piece is held.
gameprepset_gachatris_b2b_type_desc: Spins, minis, and Gachatrises add up a B2B (Bsck-to-back) chain when done consecutively. B2Bs reward extra points and garbage. Select which type of B2B to use.
gameprepset_frenzy_map_set_desc: Select which set of Frenzy maps to use for Frenzy mode.
gameprepset_gachatris_harddrop_desc: This option is on by default. This drops a Gachaquadromino instantly and locks it down.
gameprepset_linkblob_quickdrop_desc: This option is off by default. If turned on, Blob segments will land and lock itself down immediately, but that will not add up drop bonus.
gameprepset_linkblob_chainlimit_desc: Adjust how long enough a chain should be for a player to send garbage.
gameprepset_linkblob_color_desc: Adjust the number of colors existing in a session.
